meanings.sent1: I handwrite letters to my grandma.
meanings.sent2: She prefers to handwrite her notes rather than type them.
meanings.sent3: The teacher asked us to handwrite our essays, no typing allowed!
meanings.sent4: Her emotions handwrite themselves onto the paper when she writes poetry.
meanings.sent5: The artist would handwrite his dreams in a special journal every morning.

meanings.definition: The act of writing by hand.
meanings.sent1: His handwrite was neat and easy to read.
meanings.sent2: She admired the elegant handwrite in the old letters.
meanings.sent3: The messy handwrite on the grocery list made it hard to decipher.
meanings.sent4: The handwrite on the ancient scroll revealed secrets of the past.
meanings.sent5: The handwrite in the diary showed the writer's true feelings.
